name: Zombie Hunter 2018: Zombie Shooter 3D
description:
Play Zombie Hunter 2018: Zombie Shooter 3D sniper shooting game to kill zombies. This First Person Shooter (FPS) is one of the best zombie games to play. Zombie assault games are just like hunting and shooting games. Save the innocent citizens from attacking and deadly zombies. You are the only hope to save people from killing zombies. Dead zombie hunting is the first choice of action games lovers to enjoy zombie shooting thrills.

Dead target zombie game needs expert sniper shooting skills for zombie hunting. Hold your assault weapons for zombie hunting and finish all zombies. You’ve limited time to save the innocent lives from zombie attacks. Zombie assault hunting game is about to clear city from dead zombies with your sniper gun power.

Zombie Hunter 2018: Zombie Shooter 3D Game Features:
* Realistic 3D environment 
* Efficient controls and easy game-play
* 12 Story based missions 
* First Person Shooter (FPS) 
* Different snipers and assault rifles in this action game

This Zombie Hunter 2018: Zombie Shooter 3D game is story based missions to rescue citizens from killing zombies. You can use variety of sniper guns for action missions. Different kind of dead zombies in this FPS game for hunting. Stunning 3D environment with realistic animations provided to enjoy sniper shooting. Amazing and soothing sound effects provided for this shooter game to make the fun double. Hunt zombies with assault rifles and modern snipers to eliminate zombies.
